news.title: Airlines cancel more than 14,000 weekend flights as massive winter storm sweeps across the U.S.
news.summary: U.S. airlines canceled tens of thousands of flights and waived change fees for travelers. A massive winter storm swept across the country. The storm is blamed for more than a dozen deaths in the United States.

news.title: Trump threatens to impose 100% tariff if Canada makes deal with China
news.summary: Trump suggested that China would try to use Canada to try to avoid paying U.S. tariffs. In his Truth Social post, Trump suggested that Canada would be used as a bargaining chip.

news.title: Gov. Walz calls on Trump to halt ICE operations in Minnesota after another fatal shooting
news.summary: "Minnesota has had it. This is sickening. The President must end this operation. Pull the thousands of violent, untrained officers out of Minnesota," Walz said.

news.title: The top 10 analysts of 2025, as measured by TipRanks
news.summary: TipRanks highlights U.S. analysts with the most successful ratings in the previous year. This year's list includes CNN, ABC, CBS, Fox, NBC, ABC2, ABC3 and ABC4.

news.title: From Bill Gates to Emmanuel Macron: How the world’s most powerful people communicate and exert influence
news.summary: Executive coach René Carayol tells CNBC about how leaders speak. "It's not what you say, it's the way that you say it," he says.

news.title: ‘I need protein shakes’: Couples disagree about panic-buying for nationwide snowstorm
news.summary: There's one thing worse than hunkering down during a snowstorm — and that's doing so with someone who resents your spending.

news.title: I need to spend $15K on my roof. Should I take it from my Roth IRA, 401(k), IRA or money-market account?
news.summary: “I’m 61 years old, single and still have a job,” he says. “I don’t know how I did it. I’ve never been able to do it.”

news.title: ‘It’s an expensive piece of equipment’: My neighbor asked to borrow my snowblower. Do I say yes?
news.summary: “The projected snowfall this weekend doesn’t look to be changing too much,” says the National Weather Service. “It’s not going to change too much.”

news.title: My sister is buying our parents’ $3 million house, but wants to deduct $100K for renovations. Who’s right?
news.summary: “If she didn’t want the home, it would have been sold at fair market value,” the mayor says.

news.title: Nearly 15,000 U.S. flights have been canceled due to the winter storm — and counting
news.summary: Airlines have canceled nearly 15,000 flights due to a winter storm. The storm is expected to wallop two-thirds of the U.S. over the weekend.
